00022 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Listing extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractView {
00023 
00031         public function render($gp,$errors) {
00032                 
00033                 $this->gp = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00034                 
00035                 //set template
00036                 $this->template = $this->subparts['template'];
00037                 
00038                 //read settings
00039                 $settings = $this->configuration->getSettings();
00040                 if(!$settings['fe_listing.']) {
00041                         throw new Exception("No config found!");
00042                 }
00043                 $settings = $settings['fe_listing.'];
00044                 $this->settings = $settings;
00045                 
00046                 $subpart = $this->subparts['item'];
00047                 
00048                 $this->getMapping();
00049                 $markers = array();
00050                 foreach($this->model as $key=>$row) {
00051                         
00052                         $markers = $this->getValueMarkers($row);
00053                         $this->fillDefaultMarkers($markers,$row);
00054                         $markerArray['###LIST###'] .= $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($subpart,$markers);
00055                 }
00056                 $content = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($this->template,$markerArray);
00057                 if($this->gp['detailId']) {
00058                         $markerArray = $markers;
00059                         $this->fillDefaultMarkers($markerArray);
00060                         $content = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($content,$markerArray);
00061                 }
00062                 
00063                 //remove markers that were not substituted
00064                 $content = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::removeUnfilledMarkers($content);
00065                 return $this->pi_wrapInBaseClass($content);
00066         }
00067         
00078         protected function fillDefaultMarkers(&$markers,&$row = array()) {
00079                 if($row['uid']) {
00080                         $markers["###LINK2SHOW###"] = $this->cObj->getTypolink("Detail",$GLOBALS['TSFE']->id,array("mailformplusplus" => array("detailId"=>$row['uid'])));
00081                         if($this->settings['enableDelete'] == 1) {
00082                                 $markers['###DELETE###'] = $this->cObj->getTypolink("X",$GLOBALS['TSFE']->id,array("mailformplusplus" => array("deleteId"=>$row['uid'])));
00083                         }
00084                 } elseif($this->settings['enableDelete'] == 1) {
00085                         $markers['###DELETE###'] = $this->cObj->getTypolink("X",$GLOBALS['TSFE']->id,array("mailformplusplus" => array("deleteId"=>$this->gp['detailId'])));
00086                 }
00087                         
00088                 
00089                 $markers["###BACK_LINK###"] = $this->cObj->getTypolink("Back",$GLOBALS['TSFE']->id);
00090         }
00091         
00097         protected function getMapping() {
00098                 if(!is_array($this->settings['mapping.'])) {
00099                         return array();
00100                 }
00101                 
00102                 $mapping = array();
00103                 foreach($this->settings['mapping.'] as $dbfield=>$formfield) {
00104                         $mapping[$dbfield] = $formfield;
00105                 }
00106                 $this->mapping = $mapping;
00107         }
00108         
00115         protected function getValueMarkers(&$row) {
00116                 $markers = array();
00117                 foreach($row as $field=>$value) {
00118                         if(strcmp("uid",$field)) {
00119                                 $mapping = $this->mapping[$field];
00120                                 $markers['###value_'.$mapping.'###'] = $value;
00121                         }
00122                 }
00123                 return $markers;
00124         }
00125 
00126 }
